articles.author: Mark Cannizzaro
articles.title: US facing uncomfortable position as heavy Ryder Cup favorites - New York Post
articles.description: This is a highly uncomfortable position for the Americans, because they’re supposed to win this week.
articles.content:
KOHLER, Wis. On paper, it looks like a mismatch.
But you know how painful paper cuts can be.
The U.S. Ryder Cup team, as it enters this weeks 43rd edition of this blood-and-guts competition of pass… [+4776 chars]

articles.title: Irish tourists could soon return to the US as 'travel ban set to be lifted' - Irish Mirror
articles.description: Ireland is among the nations from where travel to America is currently restricted under rules introduced at the start of the Covid crisis
articles.content:
Holidaymakers from Ireland have been unable to visit the United States since March 2020 - but that could soon be about to change.
